attributes.action: remove Gluten Free "staples" from the prescription list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
a Gluten Free diet does not depend solely on Gluten Free bread, biscuits, flour and pasta on prescription.

These items should be a minor part of a normal diet. By retaining these items on a system, which is usually used for "controlled drugs", means that the manufacturers of these products do not have to  
justify their exorbitant prices. 

Gluten Free flour products are not a controlled drug and should not be treated as such.  

People should be able to buy Gluten Free products at a proper "market value" price.
